quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of brown sugar contains about 52 calories, all from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tbsp of brown sugar?
Is brown sugar healthier than white?
faqs.a: Similar calories; brown has trace molasses for minerals, but both are mostly sugar.

faqs.q: How many carbs in 1 tbsp brown sugar?
faqs.a: About 13.5 g carbs, nearly all sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does packing affect calories in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Yes; packed is denser (~12 g, 52 kcal) vs. loose (~8-10 g, 40-45 kcal).

faqs.q: What about sodium or fat in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Negligible: 0 g fat, ~3 mg sodium per tbsp.
